name: Tiburon Dominicano by Eladio Diaz
additionalNotes:
"I had an unforgettable conversation with Eladio Diaz, a legend in the cigar universe.  He handed me an epic task: to spread his revolutionary cigar knowledge across America.  He crafted an extraordinary blend, using only Dominican tobacco, to honor his incredible journey.  This masterpiece is a Privada Cigar Club exclusive.  Eladio’s trust in us to share his secret recipes is monumental.  He’s on a mission to cut through the smoke of misinformation, insisting that Americans should be hit with the raw truth about their cigars in a world where the truth often takes a backseat to sales.

This tale is not just a guide but a thrilling diary for anyone with a passion for cigars, whether you’re a rookie or a seasoned pro.  This particular cigar is a rarity, a true Dominican gem in a sea of impostors.  Often, cigars claim to be from one place, but in reality, they’re assembled from parts unknown.  This deception is a dark cloud in the cigar industry, but at Privada, we stand as a beacon of honesty, shining a light on the shadows of deceit.  When Eladio was the master blender at Davidoff, we were often unable to put out a cigar like this.  Bottom line, pay attention to this cigar, this is what good all Dominican tobacco tastes like."

https://privadacigarclub.com/product/tiburon-dominicano-aged-1-5-years/
